name: Espresso
details: Strong and concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
details: Espresso topped with equal parts of steamed milk and milk foam, often sprinkled with cocoa powder or cinnamon.

name: Caf√© Latte
details: Espresso with steamed milk and a small amount of milk foam on top.

name: Americano
details: Espresso diluted with hot water, resulting in a milder coffee flavor.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
details: Coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period, resulting in a smoother, less acidic flavor profile.

name: Mocha
details: Espresso mixed with steamed milk and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.
